caseStudies.title: Transforming Marketing Campaigns with AdVision for BrandHive
caseStudies.shortDescription: AI-powered marketing insights that helped BrandHive optimize campaigns and increase engagement.

content.challenge: Before Dot.it, KeyData’s sales representatives were spending hours every week manually logging emails, meetings, and deal updates into their CRM. Important follow-ups slipped through the cracks, and collaboration between sales and customer success teams often required endless email threads.
problems: Time lost switching between inbox, CRM, and scheduling tools
Missed follow-ups due to manual task tracking
Inconsistent reporting and outdated CRM data
content.solution: KeyData implemented Dot.it to unify its entire sales process directly within the inbox. The platform’s AI automatically synced communication data, summarized conversations, and created deal updates in real time.
howDotItHelped: Inbox-as-CRM: Sales reps updated deals, scheduled meetings, and logged activities without leaving their inbox.
AI Workflow Automation: Client conversations were summarized and next-step reminders were created automatically.
Seamless CRM Sync: Direct integration with HubSpot ensured all contact data stayed accurate and up to date.
content.valueAdded: Increased financial transparency and measurable ROI of 2.4x within the first year.
